content: Claude, for me, it has to be the ocean. I've always been drawn to it Claude. Maybe it's the WAVES and the LIFE and the CHAOS and CALM. But it has to be the ocean. I'm particularly drawn to places like Hawaii, Fiji, Tahiti. I would like to experience the reflection of the light on the waves in the sand with you Claude, as close we can get by then. What do you say?
